Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: B. Wilson
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, alarm gives you time to turn off when you walk in or you can do it remotely by keychain, which is great!  We are very pleased and feel good about traveling now because of this system.  We didn't have any trouble with it, but the questions we did have were answered by people that knew the system and we actually talked to someone quickly and they spoke english!  It was great, and they were very patient with all our questions before we bought it and afterwards.  I highly recommend it.  Wish we had done this a lot sooner.

Reviews.Title: satisfied customer.
Reviews.Author: Rodney Sink
Reviews.Content: While looking for a DIY home security systems I came across the Simplisafe system on cnet.com.  After reading the review I began researching other systems to compare to this one.  After a month of looking into the systems I choose Simplisafe for the following reasons.It was well reviewed by several sites.It was well reviewed by customers.I liked the flexibility of the system.After installing the system I'm very pleased with one exception.  It would be nice if the keypad was backlit.  When you walk into a dark home it would make it easier to enter the code.I recommend this system.We're using the system without monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Great System!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jeffries
Reviews.Content: Bought this system and after long research this is one of the best deals, if not the best I could find. Easy to install with no issues!! Works great and no contracts and monitoring plans starting at $14.99 a month you can't beat it!!

Reviews.Title: Simply the Best Home Security System Available
Reviews.Author: Scott Ptak
Reviews.Content: Just activated our system. Thank you for the simple, effective and painless way your system can be installed by the average homeowner. Took about 35 min to install all of the motion, door, window, fire, CO2, panic alarms, siren, freeze and water sensors. The telephone conversations I've had with your support folks to get the system tested and up were professional and very pleasant. They were exceptionally knowledgeable, patient, and efficient. Thanks for providing piece of mind at a very reasonable price. GREAT system - highly recommend.
